ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: 55 Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you sure?  I mean, didn t you know that quest rewards from the Plane of Air have hidden attributes?  Heh that was a good rumor =) Shada
ygData.messageBody:
Are you sure? I mean, didn't you know that quest rewards from the Plane of
Air have hidden attributes? Heh that was a good rumor =)

Shada

> Different instruments don't affect songs differently, except
> for the % increase they provide. You're not going to find
> one awesome string instrument that does affect the mana regen
> portion of Cantana where others do not. You can simply take
> a store bought lute, test for any increases and adjust that
> for all instruments with higher bonuses. There's no secrets
> or surprises here.
>
> Darkfox
> Xegony
